nodes.bodyText: I'm not much a fan of easymock. Wouldn't this easy possible to do with mockito?

nodes.bodyText: Sure, I will change it to mockito

nodes.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid unused imports such as 'org.mockito.Mockito'
when, mock, anyString is used by this import. Cidacy do not detect it
